item.title: The Dashain Industrial Complex
item.description: Nepalis are reinforced that Dashain is a time for consumption at a young age and extreme consumer culture still continues today.

item.title: Digital Wallets in Nepal
item.description: A convenient innovation with massive potential

item.title: about us
item.description: We are a group of curious nepalis that want to learn more about less conventional topics as they relate to Nepal from the lens of technology and economics.
